channel.title: Model Spot Help
channel.description:
Ok little problem. DOnt know if this is right spot though...
I added a Dragon plate model to my client and edited Bandos boots with the correct model to make it show up. When i wield it, everything is correct (it shows on chest, looks right, ect) but your feet turn invisible and it shows up in the boots slot.
[code]if(i == 15350) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14081; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1330;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 302;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 0;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = 0;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 0;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14079;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14079;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = 56;//Unknown class8.anInt197 = 116;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 14080;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 14080;//male arms/sleeves class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "This will provide excellent protection.".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
ok, what in this do i need to change so that it shows in the chest slot?

item.title: Model Spot Help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

wow! thx!

EDIT: Also, i needed to edit ITEM.cfg as well as .java(class)

the last two numbers determine where it goes

MOD: PLEASE LOCK

Read full topic

item.title: Model Spot Help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Server Side. - I think (Don’t quote me on this) It’s the Item class.

item.title: Model Spot Help

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok little problem. DOnt know if this is right spot though…

I added a Dragon plate model to my client and edited Bandos boots with the correct model to make it show up. When i wield it, everything is correct (it shows on chest, looks right, ect) but your feet turn invisible and it shows up in the boots slot.

if(i == 15350) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14081; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1330;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 302;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 0;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = 0;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 0;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14079;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14079;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = 56;//Unknown class8.anInt197 = 116;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 14080;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 14080;//male arms/sleeves class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "This will provide excellent protection.".getBytes();//examin info }
